text:
Any failure of a Contactor to comply with the requirements of Section 
12M.2 of this Chapter shall be a material breach of the Contract. In such an event, in addition to any other remedies available to it under equity or law, the City may terminate the Contract, bring a false claim action against the Contractor pursuant to 
Chapter 6 or 
Chapter 21 of the Administrative Code, or debar the Contractor. 
(Added by Proposition D, 11/7/2006)
